Match - Class in gameComponents
Match class is the class representing the match of a game, so everything concerning who is actually playing, which turn is it, the gameBoard and its state (so what tokens are in it), whose turn is it and so on.
Match(Board, Player, Player) - Constructor for class gameComponents.Match
Basic constructor for the Match class Note that variable turn is set to 1.
Match(Player, Player) - Constructor for class gameComponents.Match
Basic constructor for the Match class Note that variable turn is set to 1.
MatchTester - Class in testing
Class for testing methods and behavior of the class Match, as this class name suggests.
